channel.title: News on Rulehunter - Find simple rules in your data to meet your goals
channel.description: Recent content in News on Rulehunter - Find simple rules in your data to meet your goals

item.title: Rulehunter v0.1 Released
item.description: The first official version of Rulehunter has been released. It is fully functional and has been tested on Linux and Windows. It is available to install and run immediately.
